fr.escape.graphics

Class Texture

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.escape.graphics.Texture

  • public final class Texture
extends java.lang.Object

    A wrapper for Image which represent a drawable texture.

    This class is Immutable.

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics,
        int x,
        int y,
        int width,
        int height,
        int srcX,
        int srcY,
        int srcWidth,
        int srcHeight)

        Draw this Texture on the given Graphics2D.

        Draw from the top left corner at x,y to the bottom right corner at width,height in the Graphics2D.

        We use the rectangle in the Texture located from the top left corner at srcX,srcY to the bottom right corner at srcWidth,srcHeight.

        Parameters:
        graphics - Graphics2D used for drawing.
        x - Starting Position X in Graphics2D
        y - Starting Position Y in Graphics2D
        width - Ending Position X in Graphics2D
        height - Ending Position Y in Graphics2D
        srcX - Starting Position X in Texture
        srcY - Starting Position Y in Texture
        srcWidth - Ending Position X in Texture
        srcHeight - Ending Position Y in Texture

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics,
        int x,
        int y,
        int width,
        int height,
        int srcX,
        int srcY,
        int srcWidth,
        int srcHeight,
        double angle)

        Draw this Texture on the given Graphics2D.

        Draw from the top left corner at x,y to the bottom right corner at width,height in the Graphics2D.

        We use the rectangle in the Texture located from the top left corner at srcX,srcY to the bottom right corner at srcWidth,srcHeight.

        Apply a rotation with the given Angle in Degree.

        Parameters:
        graphics - Graphics2D used for drawing.
        x - Starting Position X in Graphics2D
        y - Starting Position Y in Graphics2D
        width - Ending Position X in Graphics2D
        height - Ending Position Y in Graphics2D
        srcX - Starting Position X in Texture
        srcY - Starting Position Y in Texture
        srcWidth - Ending Position X in Texture
        srcHeight - Ending Position Y in Texture
        angle - Rotation to apply on Texture in Degree.
